name: Heberw ,English Latters And Numbers
description: way to get validation (JavaScript) to Hebrew Latters with numbers and English Latters^[a-zA-Z0-9\u0590-\u05FF]+$^ - string start$ stringEnd+ anya-z - only a-z lowerCaseA-Z - only A-Z UpperCase\u0590-\u05FF  - Alef - Taf (ת-א) onlyvalid examples:קלט1nameשםשם123fdgh
author: Moshe Amsalem
